snippet.title: Beyond the Ice Palace 2 | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Carrying forward the legacy of its predecessor, Beyond the Ice Palace 2 reimagines the retro gaming experience with modern enhancements. 

Players step into the shoes of the ‘Cursed King’, who must rise from the depths of darkness to reclaim his throne. Armed with a weapon forged from the chains that once bound him, the king will traverse treacherous landscapes, unearth hidden treasures, and face off against monstrous foes in a dark fantasy adventure.

***Disclaimer: Beyond the Ice Palace 2 will now begin distribution on Steam on March 10, 2025, followed by Digitally on Consoles on March 11, and finally Physical copies will be released on March 13. 

https://pqube.co.uk/games/beyond-the-ice-palace-2/

Follow PQube Games on social media!
